question:
: Your children go to a local school that requires volunteers to accompany school science trips.
Write a letter to the school to apply to be a volunteer. In the letter:
- Introduce yourself and give details of your children who attend the school
- Explain why you are interested in the position
- Talk about any relevant experience that you have with children
Write about 150 words.
text: This is James Austin from the Newyorkshire region and my children Samantha and Jonason are studying in the 5th grade of your school.I am writing this letter to express my willingness to volunteer for the school science trips.

To begin with, it would be my humble pleasure if I am given this opportunity to accompany students on this trip. Further, I will get ample time to spend with my kids .Additionally , the school that provides education to my children I feel this is the best way by which  I can pay back by providing my valuable time to your institution.

Lastly, you will be happy to know that I have also worked as a museum instructor for about a year  during my early days after completing my studies so I am having enough experience in handling  children independently.I assure your institution ,that I will perform the task assigned to me in the best possible way .I am willing that I will get a positive affirmation from your institution to work as a volunteer.
Awaiting to hear a response from your side soon.
